languages.text: "Я виновен перед ними. В Схоластика Псайкана мне пророчили великое будущее, ибо я обладал редким талантом. Но судьба вмешалась в мой путь, и вместо служения на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Святой Терре{/g} я угодил сюда, в Простор, где едва виден отблеск {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Астрономикона{/g}. Тяжелый удар по моей гордыне, но я не пал духом. Я стал собирать хор астропатов, каких еще не видели здесь — могучий, звучный, поразительный. Леди Теодора не скупилась, выменивая у капитанов и губернаторов астропатов, которых я выбрал. Я сводил под своей рукой таланты и будущих гениев, что обеспечат мне возвращение и триумф".

"I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on Holy Terra, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the Astronomican reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a choir unlike any yet seen around here. A mighty, resonant, astounding choir. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

languages.text: «Soy culpable. Les fallé a todos. Me habían prometido un gran futuro en la Scholastica Psykana, pues mis talentos eran excepcionales. Pero el destino tenía otros planes, y, en lugar de servir en la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sagrada Terra{/g}, acabé aquí, en la Extensión, donde apenas alcanza un tenue brillo del {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomicón{/g}. Mi orgullo se resintió, pero mi espíritu no se rindió. Quise establecer un Coro como nunca se había visto aquí. Un Coro poderoso, resonante, impresionante. Lady Theodora empleó muchos recursos en trueques con otros capitanes y gobernadores para conseguirme a los Astrópatas que le pedí. Reuní a futuros genios y psíquicos avezados bajo mi autoridad. Pretendía que me aseguraran un regreso triunfal».
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: «Soy culpable. Les fallé a todos. Me habían prometido un gran futuro en la Scholastica Psykana, pues mis talentos eran excepcionales. Pero el destino tenía otros planes, y, en lugar de servir en la Sagrada Terra, acabé aquí, en la Extensión, donde apenas alcanza un tenue brillo del Astronomicón. Mi orgullo se resintió, pero mi espíritu no se rindió. Quise establecer un Coro como nunca se había visto aquí. Un Coro poderoso, resonante, impresionante. Reuní a futuros genios y psíquicos avezados bajo mi autoridad. Pretendía que me aseguraran un regreso triunfal».

languages.text: 「私は罪を犯しました。彼らを裏切ってしまったのです。私の才能は並外れていたため、異能高等学究院での素晴らしい将来を約束されていました。ですが、運命はそれを許しませんでした。私は{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}聖なる地球{/g}で奉仕する代わりに、{g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}星辰波{/g}の光もほとんど届かないここエクスパンスに来ることになりました。私のプライドは大きな打撃を受けましたが、私の精神はくじけませんでした。私は、ここでまだ見たこともないような聖歌隊を結成しようとしました。力強く、響き渡り、驚くべき聖歌隊を。シオドーラ様は、私が選んだ感応通信官を調達するため、船長や総督と交渉するために莫大な資金を費やしました。私は自分の権限で才能ある新進気鋭の天才たちを集めました。彼らは、私が再び輝かしく復帰するための礎となるはずでした」
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: 「私は有罪だ。彼らに取り返しのつかないことをした。私は並外れた能力の持ち主だと言われて、異能高等学究院で素晴らしい未来を約束されていたのだ。しかし、運命がそれを許さなかった。聖なる地球で仕える代わりに、星辰波の光がほとんど届かないこのエクスパンスにたどり着いた。プライドはボコボコにされたが、心は砕けなかった。ここで、今までになかった聖歌隊を結成しようと気持ちを改めた。強く、よく響き、あっと言わせる聖歌隊を作ろうと。新たに芽吹いた才能あふれる天才たちを私の指揮下に集めた。彼らが、私を堂々と返り咲かせてくれると確信していた」

languages.text: “因为我有罪，我给他们带来了劫难。很久以前，我才华出众，于是那些人承诺会让我加入灵能学会，享受美好的未来。然而，命运却另有安排，我没能在{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}神圣泰拉{/g}服役，而是被派到了科罗努斯扩区。在这里，我几乎看不到一丝{g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}星炬{/g}的明光。尽管我的自尊心遭受了沉重的打击，但我的意志并没有屈服。我着手组建起了前所未有的星语唱诗班。那是一支令人惊艳的强大团队，西奥多拉夫人花费了不计其数的资源，与众多舰长、总督交涉，将我看中的星语者召集起来。我将所有天赋异禀、前途可期的学徒聚集在我的权威之下，准备依靠他们的力量扭转局势，踏上归途。”
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: “因为我有罪，我给他们带来了劫难。很久以前，我由于才华出众，那些人承诺会让我加入灵能学会，享受美好的未来。然而命运却另有安排，我没能在神圣泰拉服役，而是被派到了科罗努斯扩区。在这里，我几乎看不到一丝星炬的明光。尽管我的自尊心遭受了沉重的打击，但我的意志并没有屈服。我着手组建起了前所未有的星语唱诗班，一支令人惊艳的强大团队。我将所有天赋异禀、前途可期的学徒聚集在我的权威之下，准备依靠他们的力量扭转局势，踏上归途。”

languages.text: "Ich bin schuldig. Ich habe ihnen Unrecht angetan. Man hatte mir eine große Zukunft in der Scholastica Psykana versprochen, denn meine Talente waren außergewöhnlich. Doch das Schicksal wollte es anders, und anstatt auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Heiligen Terra{/g} zu dienen, landete ich hier in der Ausdehnung, die kaum je ein schwaches Schimmern aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} erreicht. Mein Stolz litt schwer darunter, doch mein Wille ließ sich nicht beirren. Ich machte mich daran, einen Chor zu versammeln, wie man ihn hier noch nie gesehen hatte. Einen mächtigen, resonanten, erstaunlichen Chor. Lady Theodora investierte Unsummen in Verhandlungen mit Captains und Gouverneuren, um von mir auserkorene Astropathen zu verpflichten. Ich habe Talente und aufstrebende Genies unter meiner Autorität versammelt. Sie sollten gewährleisten, dass ich eines Tages triumphal zurückkehren kann."
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin schuldig. Ich habe ihnen Unrecht angetan. Man hatte mir eine große Zukunft in der Scholastica Psykana versprochen, denn meine Talente waren außergewöhnlich. Doch das Schicksal wollte es anders, und anstatt auf dem Heiligen Terra zu dienen, landete ich hier in der Ausdehnung, die kaum je ein schwaches Schimmern aus dem Astronomican erreicht. Mein Stolz litt schwer darunter, doch mein Wille ließ sich nicht beirren. Ich machte mich daran, einen Chor zu versammeln, wie man ihn hier noch nie gesehen hatte. Einen mächtigen, resonanten, erstaunlichen Chor. Ich habe Talente und angehende Genies unter meiner Autorität versammelt. Sie sollten gewährleisten, dass ich eines Tages triumphal zurückkehren kann."

languages.text: « C'est entièrement ma faute. Je les ai trahis. Fort de talents exceptionnels, j'étais promis à une brillante carrière au sein de la Scholastica Psykana... Mais le destin en a décidé autrement, et au lieu de servir sur la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sainte Terra{/g}, j'ai atterri ici, dans les Étendues, loin de la radiance de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g}. Mon orgueil en a pris un sacré coup, mais mon esprit est devenu d'autant plus rétif. C'est alors que je me suis mis en devoir de former un chœur tel qu'on n'en avait encore jamais vu. Un chœur puissant à la résonance inégalée. Dame Théodora a dépensé sans compter pour négocier avec différents capitaines et gouverneurs afin qu'ils lui procurent les astropathes que j'avais choisis. J'ai rassemblé sous mon autorité des individus de grand talent et des génies en devenir afin de m'assurer un retour triomphant. »
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."

traits.locale_text: « C'est entièrement ma faute. Je les ai trahis. Fort de talents exceptionnels, j'étais promis à une brillante carrière au sein de la Scholastica Psykana... Mais le destin en a décidé autrement, et au lieu de servir sur la Sainte Terra, j'ai atterri ici, dans les Étendues, loin de la radiance de l'Astronomican. Mon orgueil en a pris un sacré coup, mais mon esprit est devenu d'autant plus rétif. C'est alors que je me suis mis en devoir de former un chœur tel qu'on n'en avait encore jamais vu. Un chœur puissant à la résonance inégalée. J'ai rassemblé sous mon autorité des individus de grand talent et des génies en devenir afin de m'assurer un retour triomphant. »

languages.text: "Suçluyum. Onlara karşı kusur işledim. Becerilerimin istisnai olmasından ötürü bana Scholastica Psykana'da muazzam bir gelecek vadedildi. Fakat kaderimde öyle yazmıyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Kutsal Terra{/g}'da hizmet etmek yerine kendimi {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomikan{/g}'ın ışıltısının güç bela ulaştığı Enginlik'te buldum. Kibrime ağır bir darbe alsam da ruhum yılmak bilmedi. Bugüne kadar görülmemiş türden kudretli, kulaklarda çınlayacak, hayranlık uyandıracak bir Koro toplamak üzere harekete geçtim. Leydi Theodora, seçtiğim Astropatları Koro'ya katabilmem için kaptanlarla ve valilerle takas yaparak muazzam miktarda kaynak topladı. Yetenekli kimseleri bir araya getirdim. Yönetimim altında dehalar yetiştirdim. Mükemmel bir dönüş yapmamı sağlayacaklardı."
languages.original_text: "I am guilty. I wronged them. I had been promised a great future at the Scholastica Psykana, for my talents were exceptional. But fate would not have it, and instead of serving on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}, I ended up here in the Expanse, where barely a gleam of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstronomicanGlossary}Astronomican{/g} reaches. My pride took a heavy blow, but my spirit was not cowed. I set about to assemble a Choir unlike any yet seen here. A mighty, resonant, astounding Choir. Lady Theodora expended tremendous resources bartering with captains and governors to procure Astropaths of my choosing. I brought together talents and budding geniuses under my authority. They were to ensure I would make a triumphant comeback."
